mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(seq),0) FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_no, seq, qna_class, qna_type, cust_id, content, qna_dtm) SELECT #{qna_no}, IFNULL((SELECT MAX(seq)+1 FROM qna WHERE qna_no=#{qna_no}), 1), #{qna_class}, #{qna_type}, #{cust_id}, #{content}, #{qna_dtm}
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, c.grade FROM qna q JOIN custom c ON q.cust_id = c.cust_id WHERE q.qna_no = #{qna_no} ORDER BY q.seq

WITH latest AS ( SELECT qna_no, MAX(seq) seq FROM qna WHERE qna_type != 2 AND NOT (cust_id='system' AND qna_class=0) GROUP BY qna_no ) SELECT q.*, c.grade FROM qna q JOIN custom c ON q.cust_id = c.cust_id JOIN latest l ON q.qna_no = l.qna_no AND q.seq = l.seq ORDER BY q.qna_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qna_type = #{qna_type} WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no}
